summary: This bill, the Agriculture Grants for Veterans Education and Training Services Act (AG VETS Act), amends the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998. It directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a program awarding competitive grants to eligible entities for veteran-focused farming and ranching opportunities. Grants can be used for training, curriculum development, workshops, and other activities. Entities must provide matching non-federal funds. The bill authorizes appropriations of $5,000,000 annually from 2026 to 2030.
